title: What's the cosmic gravitational background?
itunes:title: What's the cosmic gravitational background?
description:
Daniel and Jorge explain how we might be able to listen to a new kind of gravitational hiss and what secrets it could reveal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
